summary: This mod is simple, yet incredibly complex. Please read the extended description.
descriptionHtml:
This mod uses the "unnamed" slots for the player.

DESCRIPTION
***********
This adds ten new rings to the game that can be enchanted and worn, [color=#ffff00][b]HOWEVER THEY WILL NOT BE VISIBLE ON YOUR FINGERS.[/b][/color]
They have been integrated into the WhiterunWarmaidensBlacksmithChest container's leveled list and will be found on bandits in later versions.
They have names like "Right Hand Index Finger Ring" to compensate for the player slot abuse that Bethesda has a habit of using in their games. (there were 18 armor slots for Morrowind, there are only 7 for Skyrim). You can wear one ring on each finger, and can still wear one normal ring.
author: CommunistTiger
